meta.title: Mr. Whisk Tests Quantum Trampoline Physics

beats.visual: Mr. Whisk calibrates trampoline knobs labeled 'cartoon mode'.
Test jump launches Mr. Whisk into slow orbit around birdbath.
Mr. Whisk scribbles equations midair with floating chalk.
Trampoline morphs into wave sending Mr. Whisk surfing.
Gravity pauses; Mr. Whisk floats sipping juice box.
Mr. Whisk rebounds downward, trampoline becomes giant drum.
beats.gag_note: Drum beat syncs with heartbeat monitor.

beats.visual: Backflip chain reaction launches garden gnomes cheering.
Mr. Whisk lands hero pose as trampoline bows politely.
Clip ends with slow float high-five to camera.

tts_line: Mr. Whisk thinks gravity is just a polite suggestion.
style_prompt: cartoon orange tabby cat, squash-and-stretch, clean bold outlines, flat colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, backyard trampoline lab with floating chalk equations, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
